tool_description: ℹ️ Designed for both personal and professional use, simply enter your desired job title and location to receive a tailored list of job opportunities. Try it today!
name: Linkedin jobs scraper API
title: Linkedin jobs scraper API

api_list.name: Get jobs trial (JSON)
api_list.description: Same as get jobs JSON, but limited to 25 jobs max
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://linkedin-jobs-scraper-api.p.rapidapi.com/jobs/trial"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linkedin-jobs-scraper-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
